switchy.modules.switchy_inventories.inve: A module that switches the contents of player inventories.
You will have a separate inventory for every preset.
You will have a shared inventory across all presets.
All items not currently present in your inventory will be IMMEDIATELY lost!
switchy.modules.switchy_inventories.ende: A module that switches the contents of player ender chests.
You will have a separate ender chest for every preset.
You will have a shared ender chest across all presets.
All ender chest contents not currently in your ender chest will be lost!
switchy.modules.switchy_inventories.expe: A module that switches player levels and experience.
You will have separate levels and experience per-preset.
You will share levels and experience across all presets.
All experience not currently on your hotbar will be lost!
switchy.modules.switchy_inventories.trin: A module that switches the contents of player trinket slots.
You will have a separate trinket slots for every preset.
You will share a trinket slots (and their contents) across all presets.
All trinkets equipped on other presets will be IMMEDIATELY lost!
switchy.modules.switchy_inventories.void: A module that switches void bag contents from Sweet Berry's Wandering Wizardry.
You will have a separate void bag for every preset.
You will have a shared void bag across all presets.
All void bag contents not currently in your void bag will be lost!
